Planning and Preparation (1-2 weeks):

Define the scope and objectives of the DFIR tasks.
Identify the necessary resources and team members.
Obtain the required approvals and permissions.


Endpoint Inventory (1-2 days):

Compile a comprehensive inventory of all endpoints involved.
Document their IP addresses, hostnames, and relevant metadata.


Tool Selection and Configuration (1 week):

Research and select suitable DFIR tools for scalability.
Configure the tools to collect data from multiple endpoints.


Data Collection (1-2 weeks):

Deploy agents or collectors on the endpoints.
Collect and store the required data securely.


Centralized Data Storage and Analysis (1-2 weeks):

Set up a centralized repository for storing collected data.
Implement a scalable data processing and analysis pipeline.


Automation and Workflow Orchestration (1-2 weeks):

Develop automated workflows and scripts for task execution.
Implement scheduling, parallel processing, and error handling.


Reporting and Incident Response (1 week):

Generate comprehensive reports summarizing findings.
Coordinate incident response actions as needed


Continuous Improvement (Ongoing):

Regularly review and enhance DFIR processes and tools.
Stay updated with advancements in DFIR technologies
